articles.content:
1980 F1 World Champion Alan Jones reckons Daniel Ricciardo’s time at McLaren is drawing to a close, unless he improves rapidly.

articles.title: Celtics use huge fourth quarter to roar past Warriors in NBA finals opener - The Guardian
articles.description: The Celtics rode the most lopsided fourth quarter in NBA finals history to a 120-108 victory over the Golden State Warriors in Game 1 on Thursday night
articles.content: Once Bostons balanced roster of NBA finals first-timers found a groove from long range, the determined Celtics delivered a memorable comeback and rallied past Stephen Curry and the Golden State old g… [+4677 chars]
